name: Apple Hunting
description:
Apple Hunting

This is my submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2019 game jam. The theme was "Only One".

Goal
  • Using only one arrow, hit only one apple!
  • Every time you successfully hit just one apple, you add to your streak.
  • My best streak is 6.
Controls
  • Click and drag to pull back the arrow.
  • Release to launch the arrow.
Credits
  • Coding and Art: johnnygoss.dev
  • Music: pennpierson.com
